channel.title: Accumulator
channel.description: Just wondering how to make an accumulator actually accumulate/save some of your arrows. Thanks

item.title: Accumulator
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:2, topic:302903”]Ok, so I say this every post I make; but, I haven’t worked with private servers in a while…

There should be a variable/method that controls the rate at which arrows drop. All you should have to do is edit the method that controls the rate, so when the player is wearing the accumulator, the rate changes.

Psuedo:

void method() { if (p.equipment == ####) { // Change rate } else { // Normal rate } }

Sorry I cannot provide any code for you. I am not familiar with the methods of RSPS anymore :/[/quote]
Thanks, but i can’t find the rate o.O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2009, 08:10:34 pm[/size][hr]If anyone knows please help!

Read full topic

item.title: Accumulator
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ok, so I say this every post I make; but, I haven’t worked with private servers in a while…

There should be a variable/method that controls the rate at which arrows drop. All you should have to do is edit the method that controls the rate, so when the player is wearing the accumulator, the rate changes.

Psuedo:

void method() { if (p.equipment == ####) { // Change rate } else { // Normal rate } }

Sorry I cannot provide any code for you. I am not familiar with the methods of RSPS anymore

Read full topic
